summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorney and defense counsel regarding the receipt of court materials in the case US v. Maxwell, including two protective orders issued by Judge Nathan.

connections.description: Both are defense counsel coordinating receipt of court materials in US v. Maxwell case.
Both are legal professionals (prosecutor and defense attorney) involved in the US v. Maxwell case.
Judge Nathan issued orders in the case where Bums is defense counsel.
Judge Nathan issued orders in the case where Smith is defense counsel.

events.title: Issuance of Protective Orders in US v. Maxwell
events.description: Judge Nathan issued two orders (protective order and subpoena protective order) in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is email correspondence regarding the case US v. Maxwell (20cr330).
Judge Alison J. Nathan issued two protective orders on November 24, 2021.
The communication involves coordination between prosecution and defense counsel for sharing court materials.
The case involves Ghislaine Maxwell, though she is not directly named in this email excerpt.
The correspondence shows ongoing legal proceedings in late 2021.
